name: Loud or Quiet
description: Loud or Quiet is a brutal top down shooter set in a fictional 90's America. After losing your job, your plan to rob your workplace goes drastically wrong when you are dragged into a life of crime by a mysterious woman who is not who she seems.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.0GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 128mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1200 MB available space
